name: Idea Generator
description:
Welcome to my idea generator! 

This generator includes over 500 ideas for your artwork, design, or anything you'd like to use it for. Ideas include character outfits, accessories, scenarios, aesthetics, landscapes, scenes, and general inspiration to start your project! You are free to mix and add t the ideas or palettes. Have fun with it!

"Idea" generates a random idea for your project. 

"Palette" generates a random color palette for your idea.

All "ideas" are to be made your own. What you do with it is completely up to you!

If you use this for your project, tag me on Instagram (@bunniebin) or TikTok (@binny.bun) so I can see and share it! If you stumble across any issues, feel free to DM me.

This generator will be updated with more ideas and colors in the future, stay tuned!
